Pre-Game Insights: The bi-lateral T20I Series between Nepal and the United States of America(USA) is set to begin on 17th October 2024 in Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas.
Fans from both countries are eagerly waiting for this thrilling series to kick off in USA.
Nepal and USA have not faced each other in a T20I match. This will be the first meeting between them.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will start at 5.45 AM Nepali time, while the time difference makes the game start in Nepal on 18th October 2024.
The first match is expected to be exciting for fans of both nations.
The match will be live streaming on willow tv.
Others: The venue, Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas, hosted the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.
The probable playing XI for Nepal and USA have been mentioned in the article.
